plot: After disappointing sex with wife Erma, Henry's office provides too much of an opportunity. As co-worker Jack enjoys a secretary and sends another to Bill, buxom lusty Sally wants Henry even while Erma visits. Can Jack distract Erma?
title: Like a Virgin
plot_es: After disappointing sex with wife Erma, Henry's office provides too much of an opportunity. As co-worker Jack enjoys a secretary and sends another to Bill, buxom lusty Sally wants Henry even while Erma visits. Can Jack distract Erma?
